document_data.name: House Miritar villa
document_data.architecture: Adapted tree dwelling and stone building
document_data.mainbody: The villa of '''House Miritar''' was the familial home of the [[House Miritar|Miritar]] [[elven]] family that lived in the city of [[Myth Drannor|Cormanthor]] long before it was known as "Myth Drannor".{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves|75}}
document_data.Location: The villa was located on the [[Stroll of Minstrels]], just south of the Sixstar intersection in the [[Sheshyrinnam]] district of the city.{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves/Map}}
document_data.Structure:
The entirety of the villa comprised a single structure that emerged from the ground and three massive, [[petrified]] trees that formed the borders of the property and connected to the ground building. The Miritar family residence was the perfect exemplification of organic architecture that was just as resilient as it was stunning in appearance.

The central structure of the estate stood 4 stories tall above ground level, while the three trees that framed its grounds extended some 7 stories high.
document_data.History:
As fitting for one of the [[Cormanthan]] noble families, the villa of House Miritar was created by the use of [[elven high magic]].

Every season, the family's [[illusionist]]s would change the color of the trees dwellings' petrified leaves in order to better match their surroundings.
